name: qbit-manage
description: qBitManage is a self-hosted utility for managing qBittorrent automatically. It handles categories, tags, and cleanup operations via API with simple config and CLI usage.
features: Automated categorization: Organize torrents by content type, tracker, or custom rules to maintain a structured download library.
Tag management: Apply and remove tags automatically based on torrent status, age, or seeding ratio for easier filtering.
Cleanup operations: Remove stalled, orphaned, or completed torrents based on configurable criteria to free up disk space.
Cross-seed detection: Identify and manage duplicate content across multiple trackers to optimize seeding efficiency.
Ratio management: Monitor and enforce seeding ratios per tracker or category to meet private tracker requirements.
Schedule automation: Run management tasks on a cron schedule to keep your qBittorrent instance organized without manual intervention.
API integration: Connect directly to qBittorrent's Web API for real-time torrent management and status updates.
YAML configuration: Define all rules and settings in a simple YAML file for version control and easy deployment.
Dry-run mode: Preview changes before applying them to avoid accidental deletions or modifications.
Multi-instance support: Manage multiple qBittorrent instances from a single configuration file.
Custom filters: Create complex filtering rules using torrent metadata, tracker information, and download statistics.
Logging and reporting: Track all automated actions with detailed logs for auditing and troubleshooting.
